item.title: Additive Manufacturing｜Topology Design of Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Based on Multi-objective Optimization
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Out of interest, I joined my manufacturing course teacher Kun Li’s laboratory (HπAM of State Key Laboratory of Mechanical Transmission in Chongqing University) to learn about engineering analysis of additive manufacturing, mainly focusing on shape memory alloys and multi-objective based Optimal Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Topology Design
